content: are you tired of your socks being sisters instead of twins if you have always wanted to knit two identical socks then this pattern and yarn is just right for you the pairfect yarn makes it super simple to start both socks at the same position on the yarn you can use any pairfect yarn you want for this pattern and if you need more details there are additional infos inside the ball band i am also showing you the boomerang short row heel with a few changes to it to make the heel easier to knit the pattern is written for socks in the size 37 us 6 but there are some tips included on how to knit the socks in other sizes
